title: Workplace, start app with login and server url
body:
I'd like that I can do ms-settings-workplace?login=foo&serverurl=http://enterpriseenroll.com.
to start the workplace with a link

comments.body:
Dave, Dan, Kindly let us know if you got the basic ms-settings-workplace working say when such a link is sent via email. Really I couldn't find a way to get it working, however it's working fine from within an app using the sample code given here.
http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/windows/apps/xaml/dn741261.aspx

Dave, can you explain more how you use the ms-settings-workplace command to start the workplace settings?  You're feeding a username and server url, but I can't even get the main workplace to open (just using ms-settings-workplace). What's the trick?
